Le groupe DANAYA est constitué de femmes mariées ayant en moyenne 32 ans, 3 enfants et vivant dans des familles traditionnelles à MASSABLACOURA, un des quartiers de la ville de Bougouni (3ème région administrative du Mali). 
Elles sont à leur sixième collaboration avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de tasses à travers   MAIMOUNA , de la  vente de tissus et des articles divers.
 MAIMOUNA  , avec un enfant  sous le bras sur la photo,  compte acheter avec son  prêt,  10 douzaines de tasses. Elle s’approvisionne auprès des commerçants grossistes. Elle effectue sa vente à domicile et au marché à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes, en détail, au comptant et à crédit. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 30.000.FCFA par mois dont une partie sera utilisée  pour l’appui de son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes et l’autre partie sera investie dans les activités.
texts.en:
The DANAYA group is comprised of married women whose average age is 32 and who have an average of 3 children. They live in traditional families in Massablacoura, one of the neighborhoods in the city of Bougouni (3rd administrative region of Mali). 

This is the sixth collaboration with microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso that the group has used to satisfy their customers. 

This group of women sells cups through Maimouna as well as fabric and various goods. Maimouna, the one holding a child in the photo, would like to use her loan to buy 10 dozen glasses. She buys her products from wholesalers and then sells at home and at the market, to male and female customers, and for cash and credit.

She would like to reach an average monthly profit of 30,000 FCFA - part of which will be used to help her husband with daily expenses, and part of which will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy cups.

loans.name: Samphors

texts.en:
Samphors (pictured with her loom), age 41, is a weaver. Her husband, Pork, age 44, is a fisherman. The couple also grows rice during the rice farming season. They live in a village near the Mekong River about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City, and they have three children: two sons and one daughter. One is a garment worker, another is a lathe operator and the third is still young.  

Samphors is applying for her first loan in the amount of $1,100 to purchase seeds and fertilizer to maintain her rice farm, and to buy a water pumping machine to spray her farm.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer to maintain her rice farm, and to buy a water pumping machine to spray her farm.

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Sopheap (in the photo), age 32, sells soft drinks. Her husband, Niem, age 37, is a driver. They live in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh and have two daughters who are attending school. 

Sopheap is asking for her first loan in the amount of $1,000 to expand her business by buying more soft drinks for resale.

loans.use: to expand her business by buying more soft drinks for resale.

loans.name: Lim

texts.en:
Lim (in the photo), age 41, is a widow and mother of three children: one is a tailor, and the other two are garment workers. She lives in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Lim stays at home and does housework. Her main source of income is from her children’s salaries. She is applying for her first loan in the amount of $1,500 to buy a motorcycle for her son's commute.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for her son's commute.

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Татьяна с семьей живет в Энергодаре. Она занимается реализацией детской одежды на одном из городских рынков. Татьяна продает пеленки, распашонки, халаты и т.д. Она торгует каждый день, без выходных, цены на товар у нее – низкие. У Татьяны – несколько торговых точек, две в Каменке и одна в Энергодаре. Татьяна начала свое дело 12 лет назад в Каменке. Теперь в товар уже вложено около 80 000 гривен, прибыль составляет около 6 000 гривен в месяц.  

Татьяна совсем недавно приобрела новый киоск на местном рынке. Теперь ей нужно закупить партию товара для этой торговой точки, для чего она и обратилась в КИВА за кредитом в 20 000 гривен. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Tatyana and her family live in Energodar.  She sells children's clothing at one of the city's markets.  Tatyana sells diapers, shirts, robes, etc.  She works every day with no days off.  The prices on her items are low.  Tatyana has several kiosks:  two in Kamenka and one on Erergodar.  Tatyana started her business 12 years ago in Kamenka.  Now, she has about 80,000 hryven invested in her inventory and her monthly income comes to about 6,000 hryven.  

Very recently, Tatyana acquired a new kiosk in the local market.  Now she needs to buy a stock of merchandise for this kiosk and applied for a loan through Kiva of 20,000 hryven.

loans.use: to buy a stock of merchandise for her new kiosk

loans.name: Yanosh

texts.ru:
Янош с супругой и двумя детьми живет в селе Боржава. Он торгует продуктами питания в своем родном селе. На данный момент Янош вынужден арендовать торговую точку, что недешево ему обходится. Бизнес Яноша имеет свои преимущества: разнообразный ассортимент товара, доступные цены на разные группы товаров. На данный момент у Яноша в товаре – 20 000 гривен. Занимается этим делом он уже 7 лет.  

Янош планирует использовать кредит КИВА для того, чтобы в собственном доме выделить помещение для открытия там магазина, сделать в нем ремонт и оборудовать его к открытию. Наличие собственного помещения даст Яношу возможность перейти из арендованной точки в собственную, тем самым сократив дополнительные расходы на аренду и коммунальные услуги. Новое расположение магазинчика будет очень удобным, так как он будет располагаться на главной улице, по которой в летний период много отдыхающих проезжает на пляж.    
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Yanosh, his wife, and two children live in the village of Borzhava.  He sells groceries in this, his native village.  Currently, Yanosh is forced to rent his store, and it doesn't come cheaply.  Yanosh's business has its own advantages:  a diverse assortment of goods and affordable prices on various items.  At the present time, Yanosh has 20,000 hryven worth of inventory.  He has been in this business for 7 years now.  

Yanosh is planning to use the loan he receives through Kiva to remodel his house, dividing off one part of it for a store, and to get it equipped in time for opening.  Having his own store will give Yanosh the ability to leave the rented store, and thereby end the expenses of rent and public utilities.   The store's new location is very advantageous since it is located on the main street that many vacationers use to get to the beach in Summer.

loans.use: to remodel his home into a new grocery store

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина – из Новой Каховки. Она работает на одном из местных рынков, торгуя женским и мужским бельем. У Ирины есть муж и сын. Возможность вести свое дело дает ей шанс содержать свою семью, обеспечивая их всем необходимым вот уже 12 лет. На данный момент оборотный капитал Ирины составляет 20 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль – чуть больше 7 000 гривен. 

Ирина рассчитывает вложить средства, полученные от КИВА, в пополнение ассортимента женского и мужского нижнего белья для последующей реализации на рынке. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Irina lives in Novaya Kahovka. She works at one of the local markets, selling women's and men's underwear. Irina has a husband and a son. Being able to run her own business has given Irina a chance to support her family and to provide them with all necessities for the past 12 years. Currently, Irina's working capital is 20,000 hryvnia, while her monthly net income is slightly above 7,000 hryvnia. Irina is planning to invest her Kiva loan into expanding the selection of women's and men's undergarments for subsequent sale at the market.

loans.use: to expand the selection of underwear

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр с супругой и взрослыми детьми живет в Каменке. Он занимается выращиванием ранних овощей в тепличных условиях на своем земельном участке. У Александра есть 2 большие теплицы и одна дополнительная под рассаду. Выращиванием овощей Александр занимается уже 25 лет. Этот бизнес достался ему в наследство от родителей. В хозяйство он вложит 30 000 гривен. Затраты на семена и пленку составляют 15 000 гривен ежегодно. 

Александр надеется получить кредит КИВА в размере 10 000 гривен и вложить его в постройку дополнительной теплицы. Еще одна большая теплица, сделанная на совесть, существенно расширит хозяйство Александра, давая ему возможность посадить больше помидор и развивать свое дело и дальше. На данный момент Александр сдает в аренду пай в 10 гектар. Со временем он хотел бы сам заниматься этим участком земли, засеивая ее пшеницей и ячменем.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Alexander lives in Kamenka together with his wife and grown children. He grows early vegetables in two large greenhouses on his property, while a third is used for seedlings. Alexander has been cultivating vegetables for 25 years since inheriting this business from his parents. He has initially invested 30000 hryvnia into the business, and spends 15000 hryvnia each year on seeds and plastic greenhouse covering.

Alexander is hoping to receive a Kiva loan of 10000 hryvnia and invest it into construction of an additional greenhouse. One more solidly built greenhouse will significantly expand Alexander's operation, allowing him to plant more tomatoes and to continue further developing his business. Currently, Alexander rents out a 10 hectare plot of land, but in time he would like to use it himself to grow wheat and barley.

loans.use: to build and additional greenhouse

loans.name: Ashot

texts.ru:
Ашот прошит предоставить ему кредит для закупки пленки для теплицы, удобрений, топлива, а также частичный ремонт теплиц.

В прошлом году Ашот использовал кредит на покупку котла для отопления теплицы для рассады. Он построил большую теплицу для рассады, установил газовый котел. Благодаря полученной прибыли Ашот заменил окна в своем доме, сделал небольшой ремонт. 

Ашшот имеет большой дом, но живет пока сам. Начал встречаться с девушкой, в следующем году планирует жениться.
texts.en: Ashot is requesting a loan to purchase plastic greenhouse covering, fertilizer and fuel, and also to carry out partial greenhouse repairs. Last year, Ashot used his loan to buy a heating unit for the greenhouse he uses for seedlings. He built a large seedling greenhouse and installed a gas heater. Thanks to his profits, Ashot installed new windows and made some repairs in his home. Ashot has a large house but currently lives alone. However, he has met a girl and is planning to get married next year.

loans.use: to purchase greenhouse covering, fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей живет в Водяном. Он занимается фермерством, выращивает ранние овощи в тепличных условиях. У Сергея – 6 построенных теплиц, а также одна теплица для рассады. Ежегодно он садит 10 000 кустов помидор. В хозяйство вложено 180 000 гривен. Фермерским хозяйством занимается уже 15 лет. Ежегодно на семена и пленку уходит около 85 000 гривен. 

Сергей планирует вложить кредит КИВА суммой 10 000 гривен в установку системы отопления и приобретение системы капельного полива. Качественные отопительная и оросительная системы дадут Сергею возможность выращивать продукцию раньше и продавать ее по более высокой цене. Этот бизнес – основной источник дохода в семье. Он дает хорошую прибыль, поэтому Сергей постоянно развивается и продолжает дальше вкладывать средства в свое дело. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Sergei lives in Vodyanoye. He is a farmer and has 6 greenhouses where he grows early vegetables, while an additional greenhouse is used for seedlings. Each year, Sergei plants 10,000 tomato bushes. He has invested 180,000 hryvnia into his business, which he has been running for 15 years. Each year, he spends an additional 85,000 hryvnia on seeds and plastic covering.

Sergei is planning to invest his Kiva loan of 10,000 hryvnia into installing a heating system and purchasing a drip irrigation system. Quality heating and irrigation systems will enable him to harvest his crops earlier and sell them at a higher price. This business is the main source of income in Sergei's family. It brings a good profit, which is why Sergei continues developing it and investing additional funds into his operation.

loans.use: to install heating and drip irrigation systems in his greenhouses

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Татьяна родом из Тячива, Западная Украина. Она – малый предприниматель, работает на рынке. Татьяна торгует детской одеждой на рынках района. Товар пользуется спросом, есть своя клиентская база. Татьяна тщательно следит за тем, чтобы у нее всегда был хороший ассортимент качественного товара. Работать в этой сфере начала с подачи свекрови, которая тоже работает на рынке, реализуя женскую одежду. На данный момент у Татьяна в товаре 35 000 гривен. 

Татьяна обратилась в КИВА за кредитом в размере 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы приобрести весенний товар по сезону. Она надеется и в дальнейшем развивать свой бизнес, улучшая условия проживания за счет полученной прибыли. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Tatyana was born in Tyachevo in the Western Ukraine. She is a small business owner and works on the market. Tatyana sells children's clothing on the markets in the region. Her merchandise is popular and she has a client base. Tatyana oversees the variety and quality of her merchandise with great attention. She started working in this business with the help of her mother-in-law who also works on the market selling women's clothing. At this time Tatyana has 35,000 hryvna of inventory.

Tatyana has come to KIVA for a loan in the amount of 10,000 hryvna to buy spring seasonal clothing. She hopes to continue to grow her business and to  improve the living conditions using the received profit.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal merchandise.

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Татьяна живет в селе Водяное. Она занимается сельским хозяйством, выращивая ранние овощи для оптовой продажи. У Татьяны есть 5 больших теплиц, а также 2 теплицы для рассады. В целом 0.18 гектара земли находятся у нее под пленкой. Татьяна занимается выращиванием овощей уже 20 лет. Затраты на семена и пленку составляют 50 000 гривен ежегодно. 

Татьяне необходим кредит в 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы построить дополнительную теплицу. Так как у нее есть еще свободные участки земли, Татьяна надеется поставить на них еще одну новую теплицу на данный момент. В будущем есть потенциал и для дальнейшего развития этого бизнеса. Татьяна надеется в скором построить еще две теплицы и провести отопление на огороде. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Tatyana lives in the town of Vodyanoye. She is a farmer who grows early greenhouse vegetables to sell wholesale. Tatyana has five large greenhouses as well as two greenhouses for growing transplants. In total she has 0.18 hectares (0.45 acres) under cover. Tatyana has already been farming vegetables for 20 years. Her annual costs for seed and greenhouse plastic are 50,000 hryvnia. 
 
Tatyana needs a 20,000 hryvnia loan to build an additional greenhouse. Since she has extra open land she hopes to add another new greenhouse. There is potential for continued development of the business in the future. Tatyana hopes to build two more greenhouses soon and add heating to the garden.

loans.use: build an additional greenhouse

loans.name: Natalia

texts.ru:
Наталья замужем.  Ее супруга зовут Александр. У них двое взрослых детей. Наталья имеет собственный бизнес.
Наталья занимается фермерством на протяжении 19 лет. Она выращивает ранние овощи. Это направление Наталье очень нравится. У нее две большие теплицы и теплица для рассады.  Наталья общительная, веселая и активная. Она имеет желание развиваться. В будущем Наталья хочет сделать отопление для теплиц. Наталья просит предоставить ей кредит на сумму 15000 гривен на закупку рассады и пленки, а также на ремонт теплиц.
texts.en: Natalia is married. Her husband's name is Alexander, and she has two grown children. Natalia owns her own business. She has been farming for 19 years. She raises early season vegetables. Natalia very much likes this area of work. She has two large greenhouses and a greenhouse for seedlings. Natalia is sociable, cheerful, and energetic. She has the desire to develop. In the future Natalia wants to add heating to the greenhouses. She asks for a loan of 15,000 hryvnia for purchase of transplants and greenhouse plastic, as well as for greenhouse repairs.

loans.use: buy transplants and greenhouse plastic

loans.name: Roman

texts.ru: За счет предыдущего кредита Роман увеличил количество товара и получил дополнительную прибыль. В этот раз Роману нужны дополнительные срества, чтобы увеличить количество товара на складе в канун весенних праздников, когда клиенты скупляются больше обычного. Он хочет купить такие продукты как масло, макароны, майонез, мука, сахар и т.д. Роман делает невысокую наценку на свой товар, в результате покупатели довольны, а у Ромна есть стабильный доход.
texts.en: Roman's previous loan enabled him to expand his inventory and earn additional income. This time Roman needs additional means to increase the amount of goods on the shelves on the eve of the spring holidays, when customers buy more than usual. He wants to buy products such as butter, noodles, mayonnaise, flour, sugar, etc.  The markup Roman puts on his goods is low, so the customers are happy, and Roman has a stable income.

loans.use: increase inventory before the holidays

loans.name: Yelena

texts.ru:
Елена с 11-летним сыном Александром живет в селе Гладковка. Она в разводе. Елена занимается огородничеством вот уже 15 лет. На 56 сотках земли выращивает ранний редис от 300 кг ежегодно, 2 000 кустов огурцов, 5 000 кустов помидор, 10 000 головок капусты и более 1 тонны картошки. На данный момент ее оборотный капитал составляет 60 000 гривен. Чистая средняя прибыль составляет около 3 000 гривен.  

Елена планирует вложить кредит в 8 000 гривен в закупку семян на 3 000 гривен, пленки на 3 400 гривен, химикатов-удобрений на 1 000 гривен, а также 600 гривен в мелкий ремонт теплиц.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Yelena and her 11-year-old son Alexander live in the town of Gladovka. She is divorced. Yelena has farmed vegetables for 15 years already. On 5600 square meters (1.4 acres) of land she grows 300 kg of early radishes, 2,000 cucumber plants, 5,000 tomato plants, 10,000 heads of cabbage, and over a ton of potatoes. Currently her circulating capital is 60,000 hryvnia. Her average net profit is around 3,000 hryvnia.

Yelena plans to invest the loan of 8,000 hryvnia into purchase of 3,000 hryvnia of seed, 3,400 hryvnia of greenhouse plastic, 1,000 hryvnia of chemical fertilizers, and also 600 hryvnia for minor greenhouse repairs.

loans.use: buy 3,000 hryvnia of seed, 3,400 hryvnia of greenhouse plastic, 1,000 hryvnia of chemical fertilizers, and also 600 hryvnia for minor greenhouse repairs

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр живет в Водяном и занимается сельским хозяйством. На своем участке он выращивает ранние овощи, а именно помидоры, огурцы и редис. У него есть одна теплица размером 14х80 метров, 2 арочных теплицы 7х80 метров, а также 2 теплицы под рассаду. Все они – под отоплением. Александр занимается выращиванием овощей уже 15 лет. В хозяйство у него вложено около 150 000 гривен. Затраты на семена и пленку составляют около 64 000 гривен ежегодно. 

Александру необходим кредит в размере 22 000 гривен для того, чтобы приобрести уголь на 15 000 гривен, новую полиэтиленовую пленку для покрова теплиц на 4 300 гривен и помпу для подачи воды на 2 700 гривен. У Александра есть потенциал для развития: в конце огорода имеется еще один участок земли, там можно построить дополнительную теплицу в будущем.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Alexander lives in the Vodyanoye and is involved in agriculture.  He grows early vegetables, specifically tomatoes, cucumbers and radishes, on his plot of land.  He has one 14x80 meter greenhouse, two 7x80 meter arched greenhouses and also two seedlings greenhouses.  All of them are heated.  Alexander has been involved in growing vegetables for 15 years.  He has approximately 150 000 hryvnia invested in his business.  The annual expenses for seeds and plastic amount to approximately 64 000 hryvnia.  Alexander needs a loan in the amount of 22 000 hryvnia to buy coal with 15 000 hryvnia, new plastic to cover the greenhouses with 4 300 hryvnia and a water pump with 2 700 hryvnia.  Alexander has potential for growth: he has another plot of land at the end of his farm, where another greenhouse can be built in the future.

loans.use: to buy coal with 15 000 hryvnia, new plastic to cover the greenhouses with 4 300 hryvnia and a water pump with 2 700 hryvnia

loans.name: Natalia

texts.ru:
Наталья замужем. Ее супруга зовут Сергей. У них есть маленькая дочка. Наталья имеет собственный бизнес.
Наталья занимается продажей женской обуви на протяжении 12 лет. Ей нравится это направление. Наталья разбирается в обуви. Она даже шьет в зимний период бурки и вставки для колош.  Наталья трудолюбивая и ответственная. Наталья просит предоставить ей кредит на сумму 5000 гривен на закупку женской обуви на весенний сезон. Кредит поможет ей увеличить прибыль.
texts.en: Natalia is married, and her husband's name is Sergei.  They have a little daughter.  Natalia has her own business.  She has been involved in selling women's shoes for 12 years.  She likes this business focus.  Natalia is very familiar with shoes.  She even sews cloaks and inserts for galoshes during the winter period.  Natalia is hardworking and responsible.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 5000 hryvnia to purchase women's shoes for the spring season.  The loan will help her to increase her profits.

loans.use: to purchase new shoes for the spring season

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей с супругой и двумя взрослыми детьми живет в селе Водяное. Он занимается выращиванием ранних овощей на своем участке земли в тепличных условиях. У Сергея – 5 больших теплиц, 2 отдельных просторных теплицы под рассаду. Выращиванием овощей самостоятельно занимается уже 20 лет. В хозяйство вложено 150 000 гривен. Ежегодно на семена и пленку затраты составляют 60 000 гривен. 

На кредит КИВА в размере 20 00 гривен он надеется приобрести уголь и дрова для отопления теплиц и поддержания соответствующей нужной температуры в парниковых условиях. Сергей планирует вложить 15 000 гривен в покупку угля и еще 5 000 гривен в приобретение дров. Так как систему отопления добавили только в этом году, теперь увеличились затраты на уголь и дрова. В будущем Сергей планирует поставить в уже существующих теплицах еще один котел, чтобы был теплее и урожай созревал быстрее, а также поставить еще одну дополнительную теплицу.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Sergei, his wife and two adult children live in the Vodyanoye village.  He is involved in growing early vegetables in greenhouses on his plot of land.  Sergei has five large greenhouses and two separate spacious greenhouses for seedlings.  He has been independently involved in growing vegetables for 20 years.  150 000 hryvnia has been invested into this business.  The annual expenses for seeds and plastic amount to 60 000 hryvnia.  Sergei hopes to use the 20 000 hryvnia Kiva loan to buy coal and wood for heating the greenhouses and keeping the appropriate temperature for greenhouse conditions.  Sergei plans to invest 15 000 hryvnia into the purchase of coal and 5 000 hryvnia into the purchase of wood.  Because the heating system was only added this year, now the expenses for coal and wood increased.  In the future, Sergei plans to install another boiler in the greenhouses, so that it would be warmer and result in a faster harvest, and also plans to build another greenhouse.

loans.use: to buy coal and wood for heating the greenhouses and keeping the appropriate temperature for greenhouse conditions

loans.name: Ganna

texts.ru:
Ганна хочет воспользоваться кредитом, чтобы закупить весеннюю коллекцию товара.

С предыдущего кредита Ганна получила прибыль и инвестировала ее обратно в бизнес - переоборудовала свою новую торговую точку, т.к. на рынке была реконструкция и переоборудование было обязательным условием сохранения торгового места. 

В этом году дочка Ганны бует поступать в колледж и Ганна хочет помочь ей оплатиь учебу.
texts.en:
Ganna wants to use a loan to purchase a spring collection of goods. 

With a previous loan, Ganna earned a profit and invested this profit back into her business, remodeling her new stall as the market was renovated and remodeling was necessary to preserve her selling area. 

This year, Ganna's daughter will begin college and Ganna wants to help her pay the tuition.

loans.use: purchase a spring collection of goods.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru:
Светлана живет в селе Днепровка с мужем и двумя взрослыми сыновьями. Она занимается фермерством, выращивая ранние тепличные овощи. Светлана имеет 2 участка земли, 4 большие теплицы и еще 2 маленькие. Она самостоятельно занимается выращиванием овощей вот уже 23 года. В хозяйство вложили немалые средства – около 300 000 гривен.

Светлана планирует вложить кредит КИВА в размере 20 000 гривен в закупку угля на 10 000 гривен, системы капельного орошения на 5 000 гривен, а также некоторых материалов для ремонта теплиц, а именно брусьев на 3 000 гривен и проволоки на 2 000 гривен. Светлана смогла частично установить отопление совсем недавно. Теперь ей нужен уголь для обогрева тепличных растений, а также необходимо довести до ума две теплицы, сделав там необходимый ремонт. Светлана постоянно развивается как предприниматель. В прошлом году она купила второй участок земли, поставила там 2 теплицы. Хочет поставить еще одну, доделать гараж и провести отопление во всех оставшихся теплицах. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Svetlana lives in the Dneprovka village together with her husband and two adult sons.  She is involved in farming, growing early greenhouse vegetables.  Svetlana has two plots of land, four large greenhouses and two small ones.  She has been independently involved in growing vegetables for 23 years.  A large amount of money - approximately 300 000 hryvnia -  has been invested into this business.  Svetlana plans to invest the Kiva loan in the amount of 20 000 hryvnia into a purchase of coal with 10 000 hryvnia, a drip irrigation system with 5 000 hryvnia and also some materials to repair the greenhouses, specifically wood with 3 000 hryvnia and wire with 2 000 hryvnia.  Recently, Svetlana was able to partially install a heating system.  She now needs coal to heat greenhouse plants and also needs to complete two greenhouses by making necessary repairs there.  Svetlana constantly grows as an entrepreneur.  Last year, she bought a second plot of land and installed two greenhouses there.  She wants to install another one, finish building a garage and install a heating systems in all of the remaining greenhouses.

loans.use: to buy coal, a drip irrigation system and materials to repair greenhouses

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru: Татьяна замужем, имеет двоих детей. Она имеет свой бизнес - торгует женской одеждой на рынке в городе Бердянск. Бизнес Татьяны по сравнению с другими предпринимателями обладает преимуществом в том, что товар, который предлагает Татьяна хорошего качества, а также удачное расположение торговой точки привлекает большое количество покупателей. Татьяна занимается этим бизнесом уже 7 лет. На рост бизнеса также влияет честное и уважительное отношение к клиентам и регулярное пополнение товара. Татьяна просит предоставить ей кредит на закупку женских колготок и носков.
texts.en: Tatyana is married and has two children.  She has her own business and sells women's clothing at a market in the city of Berdyansk.  Tatyana's business, compared to other entrepreneurs', has an advantage in the fact that the merchandise that Tatyana offers is of good quality, and also a smart location of her retail outlet attracts a large number of customers.  Tatyana has been involved in this business for seven years.  An honest and respectful treatment of clients and a regular update of merchandise also affects business growth.  Tatyana is requesting this loan to purchase women's stockings and socks.

loans.use: to purchase women's stockings and socks

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.ru: Чамшед трудолюбивый и добрый человек. ОН женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. В течении 7 лет он занимается купле- продажей крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Чамшед является собственником бизнеса, и он начал с 1 голов крупного и 5 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Затем постепенно расширяя бизнес, достиг больших успехов и увеличил поголовье скота. Данный момент имеет 2 голов крупного и 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Приобретает скот на местном рынке. Чамшед запрашивает займ в размере 3500 Сомони и намерен закупить скот.
texts.en: Jamshed is a hardworking and kind man. He is married and raising three children. His wife is a homemaker. For seven years he has traded cattle and small livestock. Jamshed has his own business, starting with one head of cattle and 5 small livestock. Gradually expanding his business, he has achieved much success and increased the number of livestock. At this moment, he has 2 head of cattle and 10 heads of small livestock. He purchases cattle at the local market. Jamshed is requesting a loan of 3,500 somoni and intends to purchase cattle.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Islomjon

texts.ru: Исломчон трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек, Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих сыновей. Жена работает в кондитерском цеху. Более 6 лет Исломчон занимается перевозкой и продажей извести, алебастра и фанер.   У него автомашина марки «ЗИЛ» на которой он привозит свой стройматериал и раздает по магазинам. Он является собственником бизнеса и начал данный бизнес с малых объемов, и постепенно достиг хороших результатов. Исломчон запрашивает займ для покупки стройматериалов с целью пополнения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Islomjon is a hardworking and dedicated man. He is married and raising three sons. His wife works in a candy shop. For more than 6 years, Islomjon has worked in transporting and selling lime, plaster, and plywood. He has a car (ZIL) that he uses to transport his building materials to the stores. He is the business owner and built his business from the group up, gradually achieving good results. Islomjon is requesting a loan to purchase building materials to replenish his working capital.

loans.use: To buy building materials

loans.name: Rashid

texts.ru: Рашид женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена  преподает в школе. Рашид по специальности врач и работает в больнице. На выходные дни он занимается купле- продажей скота, а также имеет землю возле своего дома, и там выращивает корма для скота и бахчевые культуры. Рашид хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота и семян. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Rashid is married and raising three children. His wife teaches at a school. Rashid is a doctor and works in a hospital. On the weekend, he trades cattle. He has land near his home and grows melons and food for the livestock there. Rashid is requesting a loan to purchase livestock and seeds. He looks forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds and cattle

loans.name: Abdimovlon

texts.ru: Абдимовлон добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он  женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Более 30 лет он занимается скотоводством и предоставлением услуг по перевозке  грузов. В бизнесе помогает жена. Абдимовлон хотел бы получить займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки стройматериалов для постройки дома. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Abdimovlon is a good and hardworking man. He is married and raising five children.  He has been involved in animal-husbandry and has been providing merchandise transport services for more than thirty years.  His wife helps him with his business.  Abdimovlon would like to receive a loan of 10,000 somoni for the purchase of building materials with which to build a house.  He looks forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.ru: Фотима замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Она трудолюбия и добрая женщина, которая на протяжении 21 года занимается откормом и разведением скота. Муж работает  рабочим  на спирт- заводе.  Она содержит скот в своем доме, имеет коровник. Бизнес является семейным, и её сын помогает ей в процветании бизнеса. Фотима хотела бы получить займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота и корма для них.
texts.en: Fotima is married and the loving mother of four children. She is a hardworking and kind woman who has fattened and bred cattle for the past 21 years. Her husband works in an alcohol factory. She keeps the cattle at her home as she has a barn. Her business is a family affair and her son helps her keep the business profitable. Fotima is requesting a loan to purchase cattle and feed for them.

loans.use: To buy cattle and feed for them

loans.name: Abdujabor

texts.ru: Абдучабор женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Он очень добрый и целеустремленный человек, который занимается  купле- продажей и обработкой ваты. Жена работает в школе учительницей. Он покупает чистый использованный хлопок, затем обрабатывает его через ватачисальный станок, затем продает клиентам. Является собственником бизнеса и продолжает данный бизнес более 7 лет. В бизнесе помогает его сын. Абдучабор запрашивает займ для покупки хлопка. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Abdujabor is married and raising two children. He is a very kind and driven man who is in the business of buying and selling wool. His wife is a schoolteacher. He buys pure used cotton and processes this through a sterilization machine and then sells it to customers. He is the owner of the business and has kept it going for more than 7 years. His son helps him with the business. Abdujabor is requesting a loan to purchase cotton. He looks forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cotton

loans.name: Farrukh

texts.ru: Фаррух активный и трудолюбивый парень, ему 21 года. Более 2-х лет он занимается  общепита. У него  диетическая столовая. Его столовую посещают много людей.  Приобретает продукты для приготовления блюд на рынке. В бизнесе помогает его дядя, а также имеет 3-х работников. Фаррух запрашивает займ для ремонта помещения столовой и покупки холодильника, чтобы хранить продукты. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Farrukh is an active and hard working young man. He is 21 years old. For more than 2 years he has been a caterer. He has a dining hall which serves many people. He uses produce from the market to prepare the food. His uncle helps him in this business, as well as 3 employees. Farrukh is asking for a loan to renovate the dining hall facility and purchase a refrigerator in order to store food. He looks forward to your help and compassion.

loans.use: To repair his café and to buy refrigerator

loans.name: Makhkam

texts.ru: Махкам трудолюбивый и добрый семьянин. Более 10 лет занимается купле- продажей канцелярских товаров. Бизнес является партнерским, партнером по бизнесу выступает Усмонова Рохбар. Он приобретает товар в городе Ташкенте.  Махкам хотел бы получить займ для покупки канцелярских товаров на пополнение оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Makhkam is a hardworking and kind family man. For more than 10 years he has bought and sold office supplies. His business is a partnership. He gets his goods in Tashkent. Makhkam is requesting a loan to purchase office supplies to replenish his working capital. He looks forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: To purchase office supplies

loans.name: Olim

texts.ru: Олим трудолюбивый и добрый человек, ему 34 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 12 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Данный момент в обороте имеет 8 голов крупного рогатого скота. Также занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Олим хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота и семян сельхозкультур для посева на корм. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Olim is thirty-four years old, married and has two children. He's also hard-working and kind. More than twelve years ago, Olim began a business focused on buying and selling cattle. Today, it's grown to a total of eight heads of cattle. He supplements his income with a little bit of farming. 
Olim is asking for a loan in order to purchase some cattle and seeds he plans to grow into fodder for his cattle.

He thanks you for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and seeds.

loans.name: Orzu

texts.ru: Орзу замужем и любящая мать двоих детей, ей 51лет. Муж является шофером. Более 6 лет она занимается выращиванием и продажей скота. Данный момент имеет 2-х голов скота. Данный бизнес приносит ей хороший доход, и от полученной прибыли она капитально отремонтировала свой дом и провела хатнатуйи своего внука. Имеет землю недалеко от своего дома, там где выращивает корма для своего скота и сельхозпродуктов. Орзу запрашивает займ для покупки скота и семян корма скота для посева.
texts.en: Orzu is married and is a loving mother of two children. She is 51 years old. Her husband is a driver. Orzu has been breeding and selling cattle for more than six years. At this time she has two heads of cattle. This business brings her good income and she used the received profits to make major remodeling to her house and held a circumcision ceremony (hatnatuyi) for her grandson. She has a plot of land near her house where she grows fodder for the cattle and cultivates plants. Orzu is asking for a loan to buy cattle and seeds for the sowing of fodder.

loans.use: to buy cattle and seeds.

loans.name: Nguwa

texts.en: Nguwa is a married man with children who attend school. He operates a goat meat business and sells his goods at the market. Price fluctuation is his major challenge. He has been in the business for the last two years. He owns house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Nguwa does farming as his side job, and he describes school fees as his greatest monthly expense. He plans to use the loan of Ksh 50,000 to buy goats for sale.

loans.use: to buy goats for sale.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is a married lady aged 25 years and has one child aged one year. She owns a tailoring shop and has been in operation for a period of one year giving her a monthly income of KES 10,000.  

She is servicing her first loan of KES 15,000 from KADET LTD that she intends to purchase sewing threads, liners, and fabric materials.  The profits will be used to repay the loan and remit back into her business. She hopes to improve her business and the living standards of her family.

loans.use: To purchase sewing threads, liners, and clothing materials.

loans.name: Mtama

texts.en: Mtama is a married woman with five children, four of whom are enrolled in school. She operates a cafe and has been in this business for the last eight years. She also sells coconuts as her other source of livelihood. Mtama lives in a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She describes seasonality as her major challenge. She joined Yehu to access loans, and she aspires to open a restaurant in the future. With the loan of Ksh 20,000, she plans to purchase wheat flour, rice, and sugar.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, rice, and sugar.

loans.name: Isack

texts.en:
Isack is a married man aged 29 years with four children between the ages of seven and one year. He owns a barber shop and has been in operation for a period of two years; he gets a monthly income of KES 3,000. 

Isack joined a self help group in KADET LTD and is servicing his first loan of KES 15,000 with which he intends to purchase an electric shaver and some detergents for his business. 

The profits will be used to start another business and expand the existing one. He hopes to prosper in business.

loans.use: To purchase an electric shaver and detergents.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, de 38 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y emprendedora.  Es conviviente con Juan quien se dedica al transporte. Vive con su pareja y sus dos  menores hijos de 13 y 7 años de edad, por los cuales se esfuerza en salir adelante,  tiene su casa propia la cual compró con el apoyo de su pareja. El trabajo de Elizabeth consiste en la venta de plátanos y pescados frescos, la cual está implementada en un espacio muy bien  acondicionado en le frontis de su casa, donde atiende muy amablemente a su clientes desde muy temprano en las mañanas. Hace más de 7 años que empezó en éste negocio con un capital propio, y durante este tiempo le valió para hacerse conocida en la zona. Dicha actividad lo realiza sola, como siempre con mucho entusiasmo.
Considera su negocio rentable pues logra acabar en vender toda su mercadería, dejándole buenas ganancias.
Le gusta su trabajo que le permite tener un ingreso económico y le da la tranquilidad de poder brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos, y le gusta socializarse, ella sigue esforzándose  gracias a que su puesto es muy concurrido. Por tanto sigue teniendo todas las ganas de ampliar su negocio y en un futuro comprar un motocarro para alquilarlo y generarse más ganancias. Este será el préstamo número 15 con la institución MFP, le gusta mucho su grupo por que siente que son responsables, está agradecido con la institución por la confianza brindada, por lo cual se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Además espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Con el préstamo de 3000 nuevos soles, comprará su mercadería como plátanos y pescados a precio por mayor, considera que a mayor cantidad más acogida tendrá su negocio y obtendrá mayores márgenes  de ganancias. Aprovechando el alza en los precios de estos productos que están en escasez.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, age 38, is a cheerful and enterprising woman. She is in a common-law relationship with Juan, who is in the transportation business. Elizabeth lives with her partner and their two young children, ages 13 and 7, who provide her with the strength to move forward. She has her own home which she purchased with the help of her partner. Elizabeth's work consists of selling bananas and fresh fish. Her business is established in a well-suited space in front of her home. She provides friendly service to her customers, beginning in the early morning hours. Elizabeth started this business more than seven years ago using her own capital. Throughout this time, she has become well-known in the area.

Elizabeth operates her business by herself, but always with great enthusiasm. She considers her business to be profitable because she sells all types of merchandise, thus generating a good revenue stream. Elizabeth enjoys her work because it enables her to have an income and peace of mind that she can provide the best for her children. She likes to socialize and her continued efforts have enabled her stand to be one of the busiest. Elizabeth continues to channel all of her efforts into the expansion of her business and in the future she would like to buy a motorcycle taxi to rent out in order to generate more income.

This will be her 15th loan with the MFP organization. She likes her group very much because she feels they are responsible. Elizabeth is grateful to MFP for the trust demonstrated to her, so she promises to be punctual with her payments. In addition, she hopes that this assistance will enable her to follow through with her plans. Her loan of 3,000 PEN will be used to buy merchandise, such as bananas and fish, at a wholesale price. Her business welcomes a large amount of inventory because she will be able to have a greater profit margin. She will take advantage of the price increase for these products since they are in short supply.

loans.use: to buy fish and bananas.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
Rosario, de 45 años de edad es una mujer trabajadora y decidida, además de ser amable y cordial.  Es conviviente con Santiago quien es comerciante y padre de sus 3 hijos. Vive en compañía de su pareja y  su hija Micol de 11 años de edad a la que quiere mucho, habitando su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Rosario es la venta de bebidas gasificadas para esto cuenta con una refrigeradora que compró con sus ahorros, donde tiene guardada a temperatura helada sus bebidas, instalada en su propia casa desde donde atiende a sus clientes con su producto. También vende comidas rápidas por las noches en el frontis de su casa.
Iniciándose con un préstamo de MFP hace 2 años y atendiendo ella sola de  manera cordial a sus clientes.
Considera su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja, pues tiene una regular clientela y los productos tiene bastante acogida siendo muy consumidos. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite estar en casa y cuidar a su hogar y tiene la compañía de su hija  a la que quiere mucho, además de los ingresos económicos que le genera para pagar los gastos de su hogar. No le gusta es cuando llueve muy seguido pues le dificulta la venta de sus comidas y bebidas pues depende en algo del clima para mejorar sus ventas, pero eso no la desanima. Por tanto, tiene planes de aumentar la variedad de sus productos con bebidas energizantes y renovar su carrito freidor para las comidas rápidas. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Además de sentirse cómoda con su banco comunal pues los considera personas responsables y solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de bebidas gasificadas de diversas marcas y presentaciones, así como ingredientes  para la preparación de comidas rápidas como papas, aceites, harinas y otros;  buscando precios más bajos por sus compras al contado.
texts.en:
Rosario is 45 years old and a hardworking and decisive woman. She is also kind and cordial. She lives with Santiago, who is a merchant and the father of her 3 children. She lives with him and her daughter Micol, who is 11 and whom she loves very much, in the house they own. Rosario's activity is selling soft drinks. To do this, she has a refrigerator that she bought with her savings and where she keeps her drinks cold. It is set up in her house and there she serves her products to her customers. She also sells fast food at night from the front of her house. 

She started with a loan MFP 2 years ago and she serves her customers alone in a friendly way. She considers her business to be very profitable because it brings her good earnings. She has a regular clientele and he products are very popular. She likes her business because it allows her to be at home and take care of things there and she can be with her daughter, whom she lives very much. She also likes the income it generates to pay for household expenses. She doesn't like it when it rains because it is difficult to sell her food and drinks because she depends somewhat on the weather to improve her sales, but this doesn't discourage her. Therefore, she has plans to increase the variety of products with energizing drinks and to improve her fryer cart for the fast food. This will be her 4th loan with MFP. She hopes for a small loan so she can meet her goals. In addition, she feels comfortable with her communal bank because she considers them to be responsible and supportive people. With the 1000 nuevos soles she has asked for, she will invest in buying different brands of soft drinks as well as ingredients to make her fast food, such as potatoes, oils, flours and more. She will seek lower prices for her purchases by paying upfront.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, oils, flours and other ingredients.

loans.name: Maria Judith

texts.es:
Maria siempre ha sido una persona emprendedora que busca en diferentes negocios la generación de sus ingresos. Además de esto, Maria es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos de quienes manifiesta son su motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio. Maria anteriormente estaba casada y con los ingresos se su esposo se sostenían los gastos de su hogar, mientras tanto ella se dedicaba a las labores del hogar. Posteriormente, con el abandono de su esposo, se vio obligada a generar los ingresos con los cuales pudiera tener en su familia una buena calidad de vida y brindar lo necesario a sus hijos. Fue así como inició su propio negocio de venta de productos de uso personal y prendas de vestir con lo que genera los ingresos para su hogar y con lo que ha podido salir adelante en la vida. Gracias a su buen servicio ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes. Con el ánimo de exhibir mejor sus productos y tener una mayor variedad de mercancía para ofrecer a sus clientes, Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una vitrina y la compra de productos de uso personal y prendas de vestir para ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.

De esta manera, Maria espera seguir generando los ingresos para su hogar con lo cual le brinda a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida y una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Maria has always been an enterprising woman who seeks to generate income in different businesses. In addition, Maria is a single mother of 2 children whom she says are her reason for working so hard in her business. Maria was married before and with her husband's income they paid the household expenses, while she did the housework. Later, when her husband abandoned her, she had to generate income to give her family a good quality of life and give her children everything they need. That was how she started her own business selling personal use products and clothing to generate income for her home and to get ahead in life. Thanks to her good service, she has been able to gain a lot of customers. Wanting to display her products better and have a greater variety of products to offer her customers, Maria seeks a loan to have the opportunity to purchase a display case and buy personal use products and clothing to offer a greater variety to her customers. 

This way, Maria hopes to keep generating income for her home and offer her children a better quality of life and a better quality education.

loans.use: to buy a display case and personal use products and clothing to offer more variety to her customers.

loans.name: Sichan

texts.en:
Sichan (in the photo) is 31 years old and her husband, Chantha is 25 years old.  They live in a village about 30 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.  They have been married since 2005 and have two children who are in school. 

Sichan is a rice farmer, while her husband is a construction worker who assists his wife in rice farming when he is free.  Sichan is applying for her first loan in the amount of $1,200 to buy a motorbike for her brother to get work.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for her brother to get work.

loans.name: Sophy

texts.en:
Sophy (pictured on the left and her sister on the right), age 26, is single.  She lives with her parents and brother and sister in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.  Her parents are farmers. 

Sophy is a garment worker.  She is asking for her first loan in the amount of $1,000 to buy a motorcycle to get to work because she commutes to work by taking a motor remoque. Taking a remoque to work is expensive.    

A remoque is a motorbike connected with a trailer at the back.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle to get work.

loans.name: Kimeng

texts.en:
Kimeng (in photo) is 43 years old and her husband, Hongleng is 42 years old.  They live in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.  They have been married since 1992 and have five children who are in school.   

Kimeng is a morning glory farmer, while her husband is a construction worker.  Kimeng is applying for her first loan of $1,000 to buy a motorbike for her husband to get to work because he commutes to work by taking a bicycle.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for her husband to get to work.

loans.name: Samnang

texts.en:
Samnang is 54 years old and her husband, Sokhom is 57 years old (pictured together).  They live in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.  They have been married since 1983 and have two sons and two daughters.  Two are married; one is a garment worker and has full-time employment.   

Samnang sells vegetables.  She buys vegetables from Phnom Penh market and transports them to resell in her local market.  Her husband stays at home.  He wants to launch a motor remoque taxi driving business.  Hence Samnang has decided to apply for a loan of $1,300 to buy a motor remoque for her husband.

A motor remoque is a motorbike connected with a trailer at the back.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike and a trailer for her husband to launch a motor remoque taxi business.

loans.name: Srey Chim

texts.en:
Srey Chim (in the photo) is a garment worker, while her husband, Chanthy is a fisherman who also raises pigs at home.  They live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City and they have one daughter who is in school. 

Srey Chim wants to stop working as a garment worker and start her own tailoring business.  She will have more time to take care of her house.  So, she is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,000 to buy a sewing machine and fabrics.

loans.use: To launch a tailoring business by buying a sewing machine and fabrics.

loans.name: Chanthou

texts.en:
Chanthou (pictured here) is 27 years old and her husband Bunthoeun is 31 years old.  They live in a suburb of Phnom Penh about 25 kilometers away and they have two young daughters. 

Chanthou sells grocery items and food at her home, while her husband is a garment worker.  She is asking for her first loan of $1,000 to expand her grocery inventory by buying more grocery items.

loans.use: To expand her grocery inventory by buying more grocery items.

loans.name: Visal

texts.en:
Visal (in the photo), age 35 and his wife, Sarom, age 36, live in a village about twenty-five kilometers from Phnom Penh City.  They have one son and one daughter who are in school. 

Visal is a rice farmer and raises cattle at home, while his wife sells fruits.  He is asking for a loan of $1,300 to purchase a new motorbike for his brother because the old one breaks down and uses more gasoline.

loans.use: To purchase a new motorbike for his brother.

loans.name: Seng

texts.en:
Seng (pictured with her loom), age 44, is a weaver.  Her husband Nao, age 48, is a construction worker and raises cattle at home.  Besides the business, the couple also grows sesame and beans when farming season comes.  They live in a village near the Mekong River about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City and they have six children, five sons and one daughter.  One is a garment worker, three attend school and other two are still too young.  

Seng is applying for her first loan in the amount of $500 to purchase weaving materials for her weaving business and to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain her sesame and bean farm.

loans.use: To purchase weaving materials for her weaving business and to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain her sesame and bean farm.

loans.name: Sreymom

texts.en:
Sreymom (in the photo) is 28 years old and her husband Ravy is 32 years old, live in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.  They have been married since 2000 and have two young daughters.    

Sreymom sells fish, while her husband is a motor taxi driver.  She is applying for a loan in the amount of $800 to expand her business by buying more fish for resale.

loans.use: To expand her business buy buying more fish for resale.

loans.name: Heng

texts.en:
Heng (pictured with her son) is 47 years old and her husband, who is 43 years old, live in a village near the Mekong River about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.  They have six children, four sons and two daughters.  One is a garment worker, three attend school and other two are still young.   

Heng is a weaver, while her husband is a construction work.  In addition, when farming season comes, they are also rice, sesame and sugarcane farmers.  Heng is applying for her first loan in the amount of $700 to buy seeds and pesticide to maintain her farm.

loans.use: To buy seeds and pesticide to maintain her farm.

loans.name: Nidia De Jesus

texts.es:
Nidia es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y esta cualidad le ha permitido superar grandes adversidades que le ha presentado la vida. Nidia es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 4 hijos de quienes manifiesta son su más grande motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su trabajo. Anteriormente Nidia vivía en otro municipio junto con su esposo, pero grandes dificultades de violencia hicieron que saliera desplazada de este municipio de donde le asesinaron 3 de sus hijos. Posteriormente su esposo los abandonó y sin hacer alguna contribución económica para el sostenimiento de sus 4 hijos, Nidia se vio en la obligación de buscar un negocio que le permitiera tener unos ingresos para dar de comer a sus hijos y poder tener una vivienda digna. Fue así como inició con la venta de prendas de vestir y accesorios para dama con lo que poco a poco fue creciendo en clientes y así ir generando buenas ventas. Posteriormente, Nidia tuvo un muy buen negocio que le permitió adquirir un local fijo en un centro comercial de su municipio y allí siguió ofreciendo las prendas de vestir y los accesorios para dama, permitiéndole  tener unas mejores ventas y siendo más reconocida por parte de sus clientes. Gracias a las buenas ventas que ha tenido, Nidia busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir y accesorios para dama para ofrecer en su negocio.

Nidia sueña con seguir teniendo buenas ventas y seguir recuperándose de las grandes dificultades que le ha presentado la vida, además, espera que sus hijos puedan tener una buena calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica en su hogar.
texts.en:
Nidia is a person who is always described as very hardworking and this quality has allowed her to overcome great adversity that has come up in life. Nidia is a single mother of 4 children whom she says are her biggest motivation for working so hard. Previously Nidia lived in another town with her husband, but big problems with violence made her move from this town where 2 of her children were murdered. Later, her husband left her and contributes nothing to supporting her 4 children. Nidia had to seek a business that would allow her to have some income to feed her children and have a worthy house. That was how she started selling women's clothing and accessories. She gained more and more customers and generated good sales. Later, Nidia had a good business, which allowed her to acquire a locale in a mall and keep offering the clothing and accessories with better sales and more recognition among her customers. Thanks to the good sales she has had, Nidia seeks a loan to afford her the opportunity to buy women's clothing and accessories to sell at her business.  

Nidia dreams of good sales and of continuing to recover from the great difficulties she has had in life. She hopes her children will have a good quality of life and financial stability in her home.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing and accessories to sell at her business.

loans.name: Maria Aleida

texts.es:
Maria siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora y siempre querer ofrecer a su familia una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso. Es por esto que desde hace aproximadamente 4 meses inició su negocio de una tienda general para contribuir económicamente en su hogar, ya que los ingresos que genera su esposo no eran suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos del hogar. Maria se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos a quienes siempre les quiere brindar una buena calidad de vida. Dado a que su negocio fue montado con muy bajo capital, aún le hace falta la consecución de algunos elementos esenciales para su tienda, y es por esto que Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de un refrigerador para su tienda.

De esta manera, Maria podrá ofrecer productos a sus clientes que requieran estar refrigerados todo el tiempo, y así aumentaran sus ventas considerablemente. Maria espera que su negocio siga adelante y este le brinde la posibilidad de ofrecerle a su familia una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Maria has always been noted as being a very hard-working person who wants to offer her family a good quality of life and more opportunities for making progress.  She set up a general store business approximately four months ago so that she could contribute financially to her household as her husband's income wasn't enough to cover their household expenses.  Maria is married and has two children who she always wants to provide with a good quality of life.  Owing to the fact that her business was set up with a very small amount of capital, she still needs to obtain a few essential items for her store.  She is looking for a loan that will allow her to buy a refrigerator for her store.  In this way, Maria will be able to offer her customers products that need to be refrigerated all the time.  This will increase her sales considerably.  Maria hopes to continue in her business and hopes that it will allow her to offer her family a good quality of life and better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for her store

loans.name: Claudia Luz

texts.es:
Claudia desde hace un tiempo decidió dedicarse a la atención de su hogar estando al cuidado de su único hijo, y por esto renunció a su empleo y decidió montar una tienda general con la que pudiera estar al cuidado de su hijo mientras estaba al cuidado de su hogar. Ahora, con los ingresos que genera su esposo y los ingresos que genera su tienda pueden sostener todos los gastos de su hogar y brindarle a su hijo una buena calidad de vida y una buena educación. Debido a que el negocio está ubicado en una vereda, puede tener acceso a una gran cantidad de clientes, ya que en ese sector no existía ninguna tienda y sus clientes debían desplazarse un gran trayecto para comprar sus productos de la canasta familiar. Con su tienda, Claudia dejo satisfecha las necesidades de estos clientes y por esto su tienda ha tenido una gran acogida por parte de ellos. Con el ánimo de aumentar sus ventas, Claudia busca adecuar unos baños para que así los clientes recurran más su tienda y de esta manera aumentar sus ventas. Es por esto que busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la adecuación de unos baños para ofrecer este servicio a sus clientes en la tienda.

Claudia espera entonces aumentar sus ventas y que su tienda siga creciendo cada vez más. Además, Claudia espera que con mayores ingresos su familia pueda acceder a tener una mayor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en: Some time ago, Claudia decided to stay at home as she had to care for her only child.  She gave up her job and decided to set up a general store so that she could care for her child and look after her home at the same time.  Now, with the income that her husband makes and the income her store makes, the family are able to cover all their household expenses and provide their son with a good quality of life and a good education.  Owing to the fact that her business is located on a main street, Claudia has access to a large number of customers.  There used to be no store in this area and her customers had to travel a long way to buy basic household products.  Claudia's store satisfies the needs of these customers and so it has become very popular.  With the aim of increasing her sales, Claudia is looking to fit out some bathrooms so that her customers will visit her store more often and her sales will increase as a result.  She is looking for a loan that will allow her to fit out some bathrooms so that she can offer this service to customers in her store.  Claudia hopes to increase her sales and hopes that her business will continue to grow.  In addition, she hopes that, with more income, her family will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to fit out some bathrooms so that she can offer this service to customers in her store

loans.name: Athou

texts.en:
Athou lives in Bor. She sells fish, and has been in business for three years. She is 40 years-old, married, and has three children; two of them are still in school. 

Athou heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer; this is her third loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1,200 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.name: Santa Rosa Group

texts.es:
Doña Emérita, cuenta con una edad de 48 años, ella reside en una aldea al sur de Honduras, es una persona muy emprendedora siempre sea dedicado a trabajar, ella tiene su negocio de pulpería en el cual vende abarrotería como ser: manteca, arroz, pollo, jabón y embutidos. También se dedica a la venta de comida sus principales clientes son personas que trabajan cerca de ese sector y vecinos.
Doña Emerita esta solicitando un préstamo de 10,000.00 lempiras para invertir en la compra de mortadela, pollo, manteca, jabón, granos básicos y otros productos de consumo, ella cree que con la ayuda de este crédito podrá abastecer mas su negocio y así generar mas ingresos para la superación de su familia.
El sueño de doña Emérita es gozar de buena salud para seguir trabajando en el crecimiento de su negocio.
Doña María Martha y Doña María Luisa también tienen actividad comercial de abarrotaría y son un grupo de señoras muy unidas.   


San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo 2012
texts.en:
Eméria, age 48, lives in a village in southern Honduras.  She is a very enterprising person who has always been devoted to working.  She has a general store where she sells groceries like lard, rice, chicken, soap, and sausages.  She also sells meals to her main customers who work close to this area, and she sells meals to her neighbors.

Emerita is requesting a loan for 10,000 lempiras to buy bologna, chicken, soap, basic grains, and other edible products.  She believes that, with the help of this loan, she will be able to stock her business more.  This way she will generate more income in order for her family’s betterment.

Emérita’s dream is to enjoy good health so that she can continue working on the growth of her business.

María Martha and María Luisa also have businesses selling groceries.  They are a group of very united women.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – March 2012

loans.use: to buy bologna, chicken, soap, basic grains, and other edible products for her business.

loans.name: Haneen

texts.en:
Haneen is photographed (she is on the right of the photo) with her daughter.

Haneen is a Palestinian married woman, her husband is employed and gets a salary, but not enough to cover all the family's costs.

For the past two years, Haneen has been making and selling hand-made food to customers. She makes Palestinian traditional foods including different types of salads like Tabboleh and different types of cooked food like Mansaf. She also buys olive oil and resells it to customers upon their request. All of these have been profitable projects.

Haneen is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing a bulk quantity of vegetables, dairy products and olive oil. Taking this loan will provide Haneen with the necessary raw materials to continue in her project and also offer customers the quantities they request. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase a bulk quantity of vegetables, dairy products and olive oil.
